sources.title: Scared to Death
sources.description: The only colour film Bela Lugosi starred in. He also had an uncredited minor role in another colour film, of which only black and white copies survive. The film starts with a woman lying on a mortuary slab awaiting her autopsy, and she then narrates how she got there. You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: Scared to Death (1946)
sources.description: A woman is married to the son of a doctor, the proprietor of a private sanatorium, where she is under unwilling treatment. Both the son and the doctor indicate they want the marriage dissolved. Arriving at the scene is a mysterious personage identified as the doctor's brother who formerly was a stage magician in Europe. He is accompanied by a threatening dwarf... Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/scared-to-death-1946/

sources.title: Scared to Death
sources.description: A woman tells the story of the events leading up to her death. Bela Lugosi's only color film.

sources.title: Scared to Death (1947) BELA LUGOSI in COLOR
sources.description:
Stars: Bela Lugosi, George Zucco, Molly Lamont
Director: Christy Cabanne

From a slab in the morgue, a dead young woman tells the bizarre tale of how she got there, through a maze of murder involving a hypnotist, a midget and a mysterious figure in a blue mask.

sources.title: Scared to Death (1947) Bela Lugosi, George Zucco | Mystery, Thriller | Color Movie
sources.description:
A thrilling mystery of a supernatural killer!
Laura Van Ee's corpse speaks from the morgue, piecing together the puzzle of her own death. As she narrates the odd and terrifying events involving a hypnotist, a midget and a mysterious figure in a green mask, the sinister plot that led to her fatal end is revealed.

Original title: Scared to Death (1947) 


Director: Frank McDonald
Writer: Winston Miller
Stars: Jack Haley, Jean Parker, Bela Lugosi 
Genre: Crime, Thriller, Horror, Mystery, Psychotronic

00:00 Full length movie.
01:51 A beautiful woman is found dead and the authorities are unsure of the cause and time of death.
06:55 A man named Leonid visits Dr. Joseph Vanee and asks for accommodation.
14:39 A private detective named Raymond investigates a mysterious package and encounters a woman named Laura who is connected to a green mask.
21:20 A conversation between two people reveals a mysterious package, a missing picture, and a potential threat.
27:20 A conversation between two individuals discussing a joke and their desire to solve a crime.
33:16 A group of people discuss a mysterious incident and the presence of reporters in a doctor's office.
39:26 A man claims he is being manipulated and terrorized by a group of people, while his wife is being held against her will.
52:20 A mysterious conversation between multiple characters unfolds, revealing secrets and suspicions.
58:00 A hypnotist helps a man's daughter recall a traumatic event involving a green face and a blindfold.
1:04:45 A woman confesses to betraying and hating a man who had power over her, leading to revenge and fear.


@CultCinemaClassics
